sentence: Republicans across Pennsylvania are questioning former President Trumps last-minute endorsement of State Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) in the gubernatorial race.
author: John Binder
title: Republicans Very Disappointed in Trumps Mastriano Endorsement, Continue Lining Up Behind Lou Barletta

sentence: A late endorsement On Saturday, Trump finally endorsed Doug Mastriano, a conspiracy-theory-minded retired military officer who leads polls in the governor's race, in an apparent attempt to hedge his bets.
title: Republican Chaos' in Pennsylvania Threatens to Upend the Midterms

sentence: | Carolyn Kaster/AP Photo By Meridith McGraw and Holly Otterbein 05/18/2022 05:50 PM EDT Donald Trump and some of his top lieutenants spent the last year privately disparaging Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano.
title: Inside the last-minute Trump endorsement that enraged Pa. Republicans
